name: Chocolate Vegan Mug Cake
description: The best chocolate vegan mug cake out there! Super fudgy, moist and perfect anytime you need a chocolate fix, quick! Ready in 1 minute.

video.name: Chocolate Vegan Mug Cake
video.description: The best chocolate vegan mug cake out there! Super fudgy, moist and perfect anytime you need a chocolate fix, quick! Ready in 1 minute.

recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon canola oil, melted coconut oil or vegan butter

recipeInstructions.text: Add the flour, cocoa powder, sugar, salt and baking powder to a mug. Stir or whisk to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the flour, cocoa powder, sugar, salt and baking powder to a mug. Stir or whisk to combine.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in the oil, non-dairy milk and vanilla into the mug with the dry ingredients and stir well with a spoon. Sprinkle the chocolate chips on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour in the oil, non-dairy milk and vanilla into the mug with the dry ingredients and stir well with a spoon. Sprinkle the chocolate chips on top.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook in the microwave for 40 seconds. It will likely be a little undercooked in the middle at this point, which is my preference, but if you want it cooked more, microwave it another 10-20 seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook in the microwave for 40 seconds. It will likely be a little undercooked in the middle at this point, which is my preference, but if you want it cooked more, microwave it another 10-20 seconds.

keywords: chocolate mug cake, easy vegan dessert, vegan cake
